item.category: Pavement Defect (uneven surface / cracked paving slab)

item.title: Bollard barely illuminated/reflection circles missing/dirty, 26th January
item.description:
At a point where you have to overtake a parked van just before this bollard on a crossing point at night it is barely visible especially when oncoming traffic headlights are dazzling. This is quite close to Hurstmere school and could easily be crashed into during the dark morning/evenings especially as there is often a parked vehicle which needs to be passed just before it heading towards sidcup. It seems either the lighting in the bollard is broken or not sufficient and only one small reflective circle
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 143, Penhill Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive commercial waste left in alley, 26th January
item.description:
Businesses using the council-owned alleyway from Ruthven street to leave food and commercial waste. Blocks entrance to my property and is a health hazard (repeated issues with rats in the summer).

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ruthven Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
